name: Osseous And Swordy
description:
If you like 2D platform games and real-time action, this game is for you to pass the time fast. Of course, the difficulty level that cannot be changed will trigger your ambition to succeed. If you have a character who gives up halfway, we don't recommend it. But if you have a warrior spirit and all challenges come easy to you, this game is for you!

Fight and evolve!: After collecting coins from each enemy you kill, the market opens every time you level up. You can upgrade your sword, health bar and shield in this market. According to your playing strategy, you can upgrade your character, pass the obstacles and play on the other level.

If you're bored, it's for you!: If you have a few hours of free time and you're looking forward to meeting someone at the end of these few hours, you can reduce these few hours to a few minutes with osseous and swordy! You will not understand how time has passed.

Accompanied by up-tempo music: Thanks to the electro music playing while fighting, your desire to fight will increase and you will want to put your glorious sword into the kidneys of all enemies!
